Hi all.
Kris Carpenter Negulescu sent information out about the coming Heri=
trix Expert Fora, the first to be held in San Francisco in Februar 24-25, 2=
010.
And wrote that additional information would be sent out in November.
N=
o further information has been sent out yet.

So, how should one sign up fo=
r one of these events?

Best Regards
